Uses of Class
jparsec.astrophysics.Table

  • Packages that use Table 
    Package Description
    jparsec.astrophysics
    Classes to operate with measurements and spectra in astrophysics.
    jparsec.astrophysics.gildas
    Classes to manipulate Gildas files.
    jparsec.io
    Provides methods for input/output, such as to read catalogs or to create reports.
    jparsec.vo
    Classes to provide Virtual Observatory services.

    • Uses of Table in jparsec.astrophysics

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Table Table.clone()
      Clones this instance.
      Table Spectrum.getAsTable()
      Returns this spectrum as a Table object in 1d.
      Table Table.getFluxAround(double ix, double iy, double rin, double rout, boolean average)
      Obtains the total flux in a given ring around certain position in the map.
      Methods in jparsec.astrophysics with parameters of type Table 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Table.add(Table table)
      Add the values in a table to the current table.
      void Table.divide(Table table)
      Divide the values in a table with the ones in the current table, one by one.
      boolean Table.isCompatible(Table table)
      Checks if this table is compatible with another one for calculations.
      void Table.multiply(Table table)
      Multiply the values in a table with the ones in the current table, one by one.
      void Table.pow(Table table)
      Raises the values in the current table to the power of the ones in the input table, one by one.
      void Table.subtract(Table table)
      Substract the values in a table to the current table.
